QuestionJSON.Question: Jessie is fascinated by genetics and wants to simulate simple inheritance using a computer program. They decide to use boolean variables to represent two genes: curlyHair (where true represents curly hair, false represents straight hair) and brownEyes (where true represents brown eyes, false represents eyes without pigment). How could Jessie express the concept of a person who inherits curly hair and brown eyes through genetics using these variables?
QuestionJSON.Explanation: Jessie is trying to represent a person who has both curly hair and brown eyes, so both the curlyHair and the brownEyes variables would need to be set to true.
